attributes.action: Ask David Cameron not to invoke Art 50 of the Lisbon Treaty (to leave the EU)
attributes.additional_details: For those of you that do not think that this petition is fair, remember that the Leave campaign/Brexit was created on false promises.
attributes.background:
Parliament is sovereign and although Brexit won, Cameron is not legally obliged to invoke the Lisbon treaty to start the EU exit.

This is because parliament is sovereign and referendums are not binding in the UK.
